"A.D.2028/4/21/19:00": "Hah... Hah... Hah..."
"Not yet, it's not over yet, Hitsugi."
"Please, Kohri, just stop already! If you keep pushing yourself, you're going to-"
"I can't. I can't afford to stop. After all, I have to save Hitsugi, and Mother said to kill you."
"Kohri's vitals are dangerously abnormal... The strain on her body is so much that she shouldn't be able to even move, but..."
"Kohri..."
"Hitsugi, stand back. I'll be the one to... end this young girl's life for you."
"This was originally my fault for not facing Kohri properly."
"That's why I will be the one held responsible... I'll be the one who... cuts Kohri down!"
"Don't be upset, Hitsugi. I don't want to see Hitsugi's upset face. I want to see your happiness more and more!"
"My first friend, when I was alone. The first person who was precious to me."
"No matter what happens, whenever, wherever, we'll always be together, Hitsugi."
"L-Let go, <%me>! Kohri needs me to-"
"1. Are you really going to strike her down?"
"2. Don't give up"
"If I could save her, I would... But... if cutting her down is all I can do... then that is my... role."
"I don't want to give up! But as long as this goes on, we'll keep suffering... So..."
"Huh? <%me>... Are you saying that I still shouldn't give up, even now?"
"Well, of course <%me> would say that. It's only natural."
"You see, Ms. Hitsugi... That person before you is someone who has never given up, no matter what. A wonderful person."
"So you can't give up either, Hitsugi. If you give up, you won't be able to do anything."
"The power that you all use is the embodiment of your desires, after all... You can't give up, no matter what!"
"Xiera..."
"Good grief... while it would be easy to quickly kill her... It'd leave a bad taste in my mouth."
"Hey Hitsugi, you're planning on saving Aru too, right? If so, then show us that you can really save them! Turn your dreams into reality with your power!"
"Big brother..."
"Please... lend me your power... the power to make my wish come true!"
"A warm light... This is... the power <%me> used... when saving me?"
"Kohri... I'm... going to save you!"
"Haaaaaaah!"
"Kohri!"
"Hit... sugi?"
"Hitsugi! Hitsugi!"
"I'm so glad... we're finally together! Finally..."
"I'm sorry... I'm sorry, Hitsugi! I was so scared... I thought that Hitsugi hated me!"
"Even though you were always with me, you were gone from me... And... and..."
"...Kohri, I'm sorry. I'm sorry I left you all alone."
"Kohri did nothing wrong. I'm the one at fault. I've been spoiled by you, Kohri... it's my fault."
"I should have talked to you properly. Instead of bottling everything in, I should have trusted you."
"My troubles, my pain... Kohri's troubles, Kohri's pain..."
"I needed to be more trusting in you. ...I'm really a failure of a friend, aren't I?"
"That's why, if Kohri is okay with it... Let's start from the beginning, okay?"
"Let's go back to that first day we met..."
"Hitsugi!"
